activities.loc: JCB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven B Wright

records.addlTxt: Arraignment on January 6, 2023 at 10:00 am; sent to Defendant at the BC Jail on 10/7/22

10:10 AM Defendant Steven B Wright appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dan Firkus in court for Steven B Wright.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
COVERS 22CF195, 22TR1221, 22TR1222, 22TR1223, 22TR1224, 22TR1273 & 22TR1274
Attorney Firkus relates and waives preliminary hearing. 
Court questions Defendant. 
The Court finds waiver is knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily given.
Court finds probable cause and binds over.
Defendant may appear by zoom from Prison.
Arraignment scheduled for January 6, 2023 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
9:05 AM Defendant Steven B Wright appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Steuer (for today) appeared by video for Steven B Wright.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS CASES 22CF195, 22TR1221, 22TR1224, 22TR1274, 22TR1223, 22TR1222, 22TR1273

9:06 AM  Court relates and gives appearances.
Court orders all above TR cases to track with 22CF195.  22CF195 is assigned to Judge Babler.
Defendant is eligible for Public Defender services but no counsel has been assigned.
All above reset before Judge Boyle.
Bond to continue.

(MS scanned to jail)
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:42 AM Case re-addressed; Atty. Firkus appears for  this case which was heard earlier this morning.  Court now resets to 10/05/2022 at 10:00 AM before Judge Babler
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

10:00 AM Defendant Steven B Wright appeared by video, in custody.  Atty. Alex Kitto appears by zoom video for today only.  Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

10:00  Court relates and gives appearances.  Atty. Kitto and defendant go into break-out room; 10:11 return from break-out room.
Atty. Kitto indicates defendant qualifies for Public Defender services and attorney will be assigned.
Reset.   Bond to continue.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.

(MS scanned to jail)

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:48 PM Defendant Steven B Wright appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Steven B Wright for today only.  Court Reporter appeared by Zoom video means. 
Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney.   Address confirmed and has NO PHONE.  AIA set before Judge Bitney and finds good cause for the adjournment.  1:51 p.m. Defendant and Attorney Kitto put in a breakout room.  1:53 p.m. back on the record.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
